law.full_text:
DISCLOSURE OF CONTENTS.
No over-the-counter drug containing caffeine, ephedrine or phenylpropanolamine shall be displayed or offered for sale, or sold, unless the name and quantity of each active ingredient is stated on the label of the container in which such drug is displayed or offered for sale or sold.

unit.catch_line: Over-The-Counter Drugs Resembling Dangerous Drugs – Sale Prohibited.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
DISCLOSURE OF CONTENTS. (§ 46.14)
DISCLOSURE OF CONTENTS. No over-the-counter drug containing caffeine, ephedrine or phenylpropanolamine shall be displayed or offered for sale, or sold, unless the name and quantity of each active ingredient is stated on the label of the container in which such drug is displayed or offered for sale or sold.
